problems.title: Permutations of a String
problems.description:
Given a string S with distinct characters, print all permutations of S using recursion.

Input Format:
A single string S.

Output Format:
Print each permutation on a new line. Any order is accepted.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
abc

Sample Output
abc
acb
bac
bca
cab
cba
(Note: Any order containing all 6 permutations once is accepted.)
hintsList: At position l, swap each character i>=l into position l, recurse on l+1, then swap back (backtracking).
